tool.name: Rename sequences
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool renames the sequence identifiers in a FASTQ/A file.
.. class:: infomark
Use this tool at the beginning of your workflow, as a way to keep the original sequence (before trimming, clipping, barcode-removal, etc).
--------
**Example**
The following Solexa-FASTQ file::
@CSHL_4_FC042GAMMII_2_1_517_596 GGTCAATGATGAGTTGGCACTGTAGGCACCATCAAT +CSHL_4_FC042GAMMII_2_1_517_596 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 38 40 40 40 40 40 14 40 40 40 40 40 36 40 13 14 24 24 9 24 9 40 10 10 15 40
Renamed to **nucleotides sequence**::
@GGTCAATGATGAGTTGGCACTGTAGGCACCATCAAT GGTCAATGATGAGTTGGCACTGTAGGCACCATCAAT +GGTCAATGATGAGTTGGCACTGTAGGCACCATCAAT 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 38 40 40 40 40 40 14 40 40 40 40 40 36 40 13 14 24 24 9 24 9 40 10 10 15 40
Renamed to **numeric counter**::
@1 GGTCAATGATGAGTTGGCACTGTAGGCACCATCAAT +1 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 40 38 40 40 40 40 40 14 40 40 40 40 40 36 40 13 14 24 24 9 24 9 40 10 10 15 40
